description: Looks like it would be a interesting game but you need someone to play with, but there's no one to play with.

About 5 years ago, I found this game and gave it a go. I couldn't get to the end, but each week I thought about how to do it. I still couldn't make progress. I tried to find information about this game on the internet, but I didn't find a single word. So today, I picked it up again, and I still can't get to the end. What a puzzle, plaguing my mind. Can't stop thinking about it.
All it says is something about a badly formatted response... is this nintendo powered? :P I'm only joking, please fix this!
summary: Doesn't even get past the title screen
